parameters: \n<Genko>Hahaha tomorrow is the day! No training for me today, only beer!
\n<Genko>Haha the day is almost here little soldier!! It's almost time for you to show these other people that you want to be Qin-Song’s second defender!
\n<Genko>Haha the day is almost here little soldier!! It's almost time for you to show these other people that you want to be Qin-Song’s second defender!
\n<Genko>Haha the day is almost here little soldier!! It's almost time for you to show these other people that you want to be Qin-Song’s second defender!
\n<Genko>Haha the day is almost here little soldier!! It's almost time for you to show these other people that you want to be Qin-Song’s second defender!

\n<Suki>Enjoy your last day as a child Matsu!! After today you won’t be “my little warrior” anymore, you’ll be Matsuki! The decider of her own destiny! I’m so very proud of you! I’ve got food and drink for all of the festivities, so be sure to enjoy yourself!

\n<Suki>Enjoy your last day as a child Matsu!! After today you won’t be “my little warrior” anymore, you’ll be Matsuki! The decider of her own destiny! I’m so very proud of you! I’ve got food and drink for all of the festivities, so be sure to enjoy yourself!
\n<Suki>Now don't forget to go win over shiori, ok? You're going to be an adult, not a scared kitten.
\n<Suki>Now don't forget to go win over shiori, ok? You're going to be an adult, not a scared kitten.
\n<Lieza>It’s so wonderful of your mother to give us all free drinks the night before your day of choosing~ I’m just enjoying the day~
\n<Matsuki>Isn’t that a celebration best saved for nighttime?
\n<Lieza>It’s so wonderful of your mother to give us all free drinks the night before your day of choosing~ I’m just enjoying the day~
\n<Matsuki>Isn’t that a celebration best saved for nighttime?
\n<Lieza>Choose the farm side, we grow cookies~
\n<Lieza>Choose the farm side, we grow cookies~
\n<Tobi>When you’re an adult, will you still love me?
\n<Matsuki>Tobi!! Of course your big sister will!! Even if I end up leaving for a bit, your big sister will find a way to be here for you, ok?
\n<Matsuki>Of course buddy, I’m not going anywhere ok?
\n<Matsuki>hahaha of course buddy, I’ll always get you pie too!
\n<Tobi>I'm gonna tell Jet you're gonna make me a pie!
\n<Sara>Jet is going to win our contest now Matsu! It’s not fair!
\n<Sara>We catch the bugs outside!! It’s really hard, but the one with the most wins! I had to help daddy make clothes today while Jet caught them and now I’m here with adults getting silly!!
\n<Matsuki>hahaha well how about your cousin Matsu takes care of it?
Your Quest Journal has been updated!
\n<Jet>Adults always get silly at Auntie Suki’s parties, are you going to get silly too after your day of choosing?
\n<Sachi>A Godly shrine maiden myself has left the temptation of beer behind many moons ago..
\n<Matsuki>Then why are there so many empty wine bottles over here.
\n<Sachi>Wine is a Godly drink and you would do well to remember that in your adulthood!!!!
\n<Tolkien>Meat isn’t metal, it cannot be fixed.
\n<Tolkien>Meat isn’t metal, it cannot be fixed.
\n<Tolkien>Meat isn’t metal, it cannot be fixed.
\n<Tolkien>Meat isn’t metal, it cannot be fixed.
\n<Menke>Matsuki!! What a special day today is!!
\n<Matsuki>Thanks Menke that means a lot to-
\n<Menke>I’m selling my special detergent today! Perfect for getting any wine spills out!!
\n<Matsuki>Thanks Menke that means a lot to-
\n<Menke>I’m selling my special detergent today! Perfect for getting any wine spills out!!
\n<Menke>Talk is cheap, young Matsuki. But I am cheaper.
\n<Shiori>You finally arrived to your own party!!
I hope I can live up to their expectations
Do I look older to you?
I hope you’re into older women!
I hope I can live up to their expectations
\n<Matsuki>I mean really live up to them though...

\n<Matsuki>Like..I’m so fortunate to have parents that are proud of me no matter what, but that means I have to work even harder. They deserve to have a real reason to be proud of me. I can’t let them down after they’ve been so supportive of me. I just can’t.
\n<Matsuki>? Ok, but what does that have to do with-
\n<Shiori>You don’t need to give them a reason, you’re already such a good and wonderful person. They don’t need further reason than that.
\n<Shiori>My parents were proud of you too. So don’t worry ok?
\n<Shiori>Children don’t need to be anything but themselves to make their parents proud of them. That’s how it should be.
Do I look older to you?
\n<Shiori>Hm… yes you do. You seem calmer, more confident. You’re ready to make a decision aren’t you?
\n<Shiori>Well then Matsu just keep faking it then! You fooled me!
\n<Shiori>I’m so proud of you, you’ll do great, ok? Wait for me to be old enough too, ok?
I hope you’re into older women!
\n<Shiori>An older woman? Oh no, not for me.
\n<Matsuki>Ah (I think that’s my heart I feel next to my feet..)
\n<Shiori>But you? Oh Matsu, I think I really like you...
\n<Shiori>Haha I’m terrible at keeping secrets.. I had it in my mind to confess to you on your day of choosing, but I can’t help but give hints when you look at me the way you do...
\n<Shiori>So yes, Matsu...I really like you. Would you ask me out so I can see if one day I’ll love you too?
\n<Matsuki>I know, that’s why I gave it.
\n<Shiori>I...well then I’ll be sure to cherish it. It’s not everyday a girl receives something from such a wonderful person.
\n<Shiori>You're wonderful Matsu. I hope that never changes..
\n<Shiori>You'd have to at least take me out to dinner first~
\n<Matsuki> (I don't have anything good enough to give Shiori!!!)
\n<Shiori>Well how could I say no to such a beautiful girl?
\n<Shiori>Haha I can see you getting red, does the thought of dating me really make you that happy?
\n<Matsuki>Yes!! I’ve wanted...yes!! Hahaha!!! This is great!!! I was so worried!!
\n<Shiori>Well let me put those worries to rest..how about your first day of being a true adult? It gives me two days to prepare..
\n<Matsuki>I’d love to!! Whatever you want to do! Just let me know!!
\n<Shiori>You finally arrived to your own party!!
I hope I can live up to their expectations
Do I look older to you?
I hope you’re into older women!
I hope I can live up to their expectations
\n<Matsuki>I mean really live up to them though...

\n<Shiori>So yes, Matsu...I really like you. Would you ask me out so I can see if one day I’ll love you too?

\n<Shiori>Haha I can see you getting red, does the thought of dating me really make you that happy?
\n<Matsuki>Yes!! I’ve wanted...yes!! Hahaha!!! This is great!!! I was so worried!!
\n<Shiori>Well let me put those worries to rest..how about tomorrow night? If you aren’t too tired from your big day?
\n<Matsuki>I’d love to!! Whatever you want to do! Just let me know!!
\n<Misha>So Matsu, are you going to ask Shiori out today?
\n<Matsuki>.....ok yeah I was planning to...\. I’m nervous.
\n<Misha>You can’t hope for victory while expecting failure.
\n<Misha>You have to believe in it and hold onto it to make it happen.
\n<Matsuki>But what if we start arguing? It would ruin our friendship..
\n<Misha>Would you like to hear a story? About your mother and I?
\n<Misha>You would have to be blind to reality to not notice how different the two of us are. I don’t believe we’re gone more than two days without arguing about something.
\n<Misha>And yet our love is as strong as ever.
\n<Misha>Love isn’t always perfect, but if you both care about each other and put the work toward a common goal.
